projects.title: CuisineFiesta App üçú
projects.description: Discover the ultimate Full-Stack, All-in-JS application! CuisineFiesta offers secure authentication and seamless CRUD operations on a comprehensive recipe API. Unleash your inner chef and explore a world of culinary delights.
projects.issues: I assumed responsibility for both front-end and back-end development in CuisineFiesta. This project taught me the value of patience and the iterative nature of front-end development. It was a valuable learning experience that allowed me to refine my design and user interface skills.

projects.issues: In my first venture into React, I created a Pok√©dex application. The most challenging aspect was grasping the intricacies of the state and props system within React. However, as I delved deeper into the project, things started to fall into place.

projects.title: Book API üìï
projects.description: For this project, I created an API with MongoDB, Mongoose, Node.js, Express, Postman, as well as Sharp and Multer to allow users to add optimized images to the site.
projects.issues: This project introduced me to technologies like Sharp and Multer. The mechanics of middlewares were relatively straightforward but handling media assets in web development for web performance was NOT a piece of cake !
